sentences.english: He suggested that tangling fishing gear should be made a criminal offence.
sentences.chinese: 他提议，缠绕捕鱼器材应该算刑事犯罪。

sentences.english: Ltd. is a company specializing in development, production and sales on audio equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司主要从事专业音响器材的研制，生产及销售。

sentences.english: A: There’s a big sale on clothes and sporting goods at Riverside Mall.
sentences.chinese: 河畔购物中心的衣服和运动器材大减价。

sentences.english: Synopsis. Each family has, on average, at least one sports requisite.
sentences.chinese: 平均每个家庭已拥有一件体育器材。

sentences.english: A sports organizer lets you see what’s where while keeping equipment in its place.
sentences.chinese: 运动器材存放处让你对它们的位置一目了然。

sentences.english: A special medical device for the treatment of congenital megacolon is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一种用于治疗先天性巨结肠的专用医疗器材。

sentences.english: A camera doesn't take the photo, nor does any piece of photographic equipment.
sentences.chinese: 相机自己可不会拍照片，任何一件摄影器材都不会。

sentences.english: Jiang Mou uses civilian battalion express delivery in Nanning, sent cogged material to Liang Mou.
sentences.chinese: 蒋某则在南宁用民营快递，给梁某寄去了作弊器材。

sentences.english: What do you think of the equipments and facilities provided in the S&R outlets?
sentences.chinese: 您认为会所康体部门提供的器材品质如何？

sentences.english: Also many of the doors, windows, sinks, plumbing parts and appliances were used.
sentences.chinese: 另外的门，窗，水槽，管道配件及器材许多人使用。

sentences.english: Public Transportation Fire Control Equipment Maintaining Dept.
Others, who prefer convenience and privacy, set up fitness equipment in their own homes.
sentences.chinese: 那些喜欢方便和隐私的人则自家购置了健身器材。

sentences.english: There are different sports apparatus in the gym.
sentences.chinese: 体育馆里有各种体育器材。

sentences.english: Contacted with the intermediate section of the brush bristle, the cookers are without abrasion.
sentences.chinese: 与刷子刺毛的中间部分接触，烹饪器材是没有磨蚀。

sentences.english: There is usually ski equipment rental, visitors are not anti-rent.
sentences.chinese: 通常滑雪场有器材出租，游客不防租借。

sentences.english: Can you go to the plumbing department for those, while I go to the hardware department for the tools?
sentences.chinese: 你能去水暖器材区买吗，我还要去五金区买工具？

definition: camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
